title: Maisaka, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar center L; ULQ
description: overlooking a coastal inlet; several low boats moored in water with men wading and peering into water; three large junks with sails up at LR; other approaching ships with sails at UL; mountains in background; Mt. Fuji in white at UR
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
